vehicles

Class AbstractWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • vehicles.AbstractWorld
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProtoWorld

    public abstract class AbstractWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract world for the vehicles simulation. Includes the list of vehicles and the list of sources.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SourceList theSourceList
      The list of sources
      protected VehicleList theVehicleList
      List of vehicles

      Creates a new instance of World

      Calculate the value of the stimulus over all the sources (note: to handle multiple sources, this should likely have another parameter to specify the type of source?).

      Paint the world.

      • step

        public abstract void step()
        Step the world one step. To do this must step each vehicle.

      • getStimulusStrength

        public abstract double getStimulusStrength(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double where)
        Calculate the value of the stimulus over all the sources (note: to handle multiple sources, this should likely have another parameter to specify the type of source?).
        Parameters:
        where - The location of the sensor that wants to know its current input.
        Returns:
        The value of the stimulus (summed over all the sources) at the Point passed

      • paint

        public abstract void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paint the world. Need to paint all the Vehicles and Sources.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context (from the Applet).
